title: Designing Learning Experience Evaluations Using Wearable Devices

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Core Scientific Theories and Experimental Procedures
context.additional_context: Customized science education for working professionals, emphasizing learning effectiveness monitoring via wearable devices in real-time online environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain their learning concentration patterns by analyzing physiological data collected from wearable devices.
Learners can propose at least three strategies to optimize learning activities based on real-time physiological data.
Learners can interpret 6.25-minute segments of physiological data and evaluate learning efficiency within a 13.8% error margin.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
